titleStmt.title: Englands slavery, or Barbados merchandize; represented in a petition to the high court of Parliament, by Marcellus Rivers and Oxenbridge Foyle gentlemen, on behalf of themselves and three-score and ten more free-born Englishmen sold (uncondemned) into slavery: together with letters written to some honourable members of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Rivers, Marcellus.

titleStmt.author: Rivers, Marcellus.
